name: Let's Foosball
description:
‧WINNER of Gold Award in TIDCA 2013

Playing as http://youtu.be/JOiuZGm3-YY
Let's foosball is the best table-soccer for iOS device. One player, two players even more players can enjoy in one device by multi-touch control.
Realistic physics engine can represent the collision and rolling trajectory of football and figures. Switch to any view you'd like and select your favorite layout. Let's start a foosball match in your own style!

Just spin the rods and shoot ball into goal!
Enjoy "Let's Foosball" with loud cheer and applause.
--------------------------
＊ Game Mode ＊
[Free Play] 4 difficulty levels. It's up to you to select an easy relaxation or hard training.
[2 Players VS] Who is the king of Foosball? Try 2 Player Vs mode, and the outcome will appear soon :D
[Challenge] Use your skill to against more and more powerful opponents.
--------------------------
＊ Control assistance ＊
[Novice] Auto goalkeeper, auto-spin 3 rods, just slide to block the ball
[Auto Goalkeeper] manual spin and slide 3 rods
[Advanced] manual control 4 rods with spin and slide
--------------------------
＊ Touch setting ＊
[One Finger Mode] one touch control all rods sync. (iPhone/iPod only)
[Counter balance] keep weight balance or rod-players always stand up.
[Control spin] left or right slide to spin-attack by rotation-way. ex: reverse or not.
--------------------------
＊ Team Customize ＊
7 Layouts: 352, 253, 442, 244, 343, 334, 433
6 different uniforms
--------------------------
＊ Features ＊
Support new iPad with Retina display.
Smoothly screen refresh: FPS 50+ on iPad1; 60+ on iPad2; 50+ on iPhone/iPod.
Precisely control: kick by large-angle, spinning rods
Bullet Physics engine provides real game effect.
Instant replay as slow motion while goal.
Free camera setting for your favorite view.
Support Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements.
Player Statistics of Challenge
Extra table after complete 20 games with Game Center login.
